name: places/ChIJPxACDBpbwokROc8Ds_8m9WQ
adrFormatAddress: 60 Furman St, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

editorialSummary.text: Rooftop spot for fancy cocktails & choice bites on the roof of 1 Hotel, with Manhattan views.

originalText.text:
I recently dined at this restaurant and was truly blown away by the entire experience. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted warmly by the hosts. The ambiance was fantastic, but it was the view that truly stole the show – absolutely amazing.

The rolls we ordered were nothing short of delicious; they were a perfect blend of flavors and textures that left us craving for more. However, what truly set this dining experience apart was the exceptional service. Jonathan, our server, was attentive and made sure we were comfortable throughout the meal. He constantly checked on us, ensuring that our needs were met promptly.

Our waitress and the rest of the staff were equally outstanding, going out of their way to make our visit enjoyable. The wait, though longer than expected, was definitely worth it considering the impeccable service and the breathtaking view.

I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone seeking a memorable dining experience. The combination of amazing food, a stunning view, and top-notch service make it a must-visit destination. We'll definitely be returning soon!

originalText.text: Some of the best views in New York! A truly wonderful spot to watch the sun set have some cocktails and sushi! The atmosphere was truly great and the truffle sushi was incredible, will be thinking about it for years to come. For the evenings I 100% recommend making a reservation as sunset is very popular but we went during the day as well and it was quiet. My only complaint would be that despite having a birthday evening reservation, service was so slow and drinks took 20 mins to come each time, it was hard to flag down a waiter to order - this wouldn’t have been a problem but when you only have the table for 2h before they ask you leave even if you haven’t finished your food/drinks it becomes less fun.

originalText.text: If you want a big meal don't come here but if you want the atmosphere and some great food then this is the place by the water with the rooftop bar even inside was nice. Steak was very good The shrimp was very good The cold crab was good everything was good service was great. Oh I feel like a good martini the Fulton ferry with gin and strega strega is from 70 different herbs and has a little smoky flavor to it really good and strong like I like it

originalText.text: I came here to celebrate my sister’s bday. The service was amazing and the food was good. The view is out of the world, we came before sunset and was able to take a lot of photo and after we drink and eat, we went to the rooftop to take more photo. Definitely recommend the Purple Haze for cocktails. The tuna tartare was the best I ever had, the chip was homemade, it was so good that I would come back just for that alone.

originalText.text: Nice bar with great views of the Manhattan skyline.  Service is impeccable. Good cocktails to go along with a limited but a good menu.

text.text: Nice bar with great views of the Manhattan skyline.  Service is impeccable. Good cocktails to go along with a limited but a good menu.
